name: HapYak API
body:
# HapYak API

## Javascript API

### Viewer API
```javascript
hapyak.viewer({
    player: vjs,
    playerType: "videojs",
    playerWidth: 640,
    playerHeight: 360,
    trackId: ,
    autoplay: true
});
```
